articles.description: Walmart is beating a retreat from Japan, giving up on a years-long attempt to crack the country's retail market.

articles.title: Over 10,000 Power Outages Reported Across Conn., Some Schools Delayed, Closed Due to Storm Damage - NBC Connecticut
articles.description: Thousands of power outages are reported across Connecticut as a result of Sunday night’s storms and some schools were on a two-hour delay on Monday while…
articles.content:
Thousands of power outages are reported across Connecticut as a result of Sunday night's storms and some schools were on a two-hour delay on Monday while others were closed.

articles.author: Lauren Thomas
articles.title: Mall owners Simon and Taubman revise merger terms, with $800 million price cut - CNBC
articles.description: Under the new deal, Simon Property Group will now pay $43 per share for Taubman Centers, down from an original price of $52.50.
articles.content: Luxury mall owner Taubman Centers has agreed to a lower price to merge with the biggest mall owner in America, Simon Property Group, the companies announced Sunday, evading what could have been a hea… [+2332 chars]
